description: New strategies that integrate imaging into the management of acute ischemic stroke (AIS) published in the January 2017 issue of the American Journal of Roentgenology will be discussed in a webinar hosted by ARRS
title: Webinar to highlight strategies, limitations of managing acute ischemic stroke
text: Leesburg, VA, Jan. 30, 2016 -- New strategies that integrate imaging into the management of acute ischemic stroke (AIS) published in the January 2017 issue of the American Journal of Roentgenology will be discussed in a webinar hosted by ARRS. The study is available on the AJR website accessible by clicking here.
